org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.balancer

Class KeyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.balancer.KeyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, DataEncryptionKeyFactory

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class KeyManager
extends Object
implements Closeable, DataEncryptionKeyFactory
    The class provides utilities for key and token management.
